frame.name: Moving_in_place
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Theme</fen> moves with respect to a <fen>Fixed_location</fen>, generally with a certain <fen>Periodicity</fen>, without undergoing unbounded translational motion or significant alteration of configuration/shape.
<ex><fex name="Theme">It</fex> <t>vibrated</t> <fex name="Explanation">from the wind</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Theme
FE.definition: <def-root>A physical entity that is participating in non-translational motion.</def-root>

FE.name: Fixed_location
FE.definition: <def-root>The point or set of points that define the limits of motion for the <fen>Theme</fen>. For spinning motions, it is the axis, for vibrating it is a boundary, for swinging it is a point. <ex>Balls <t>spin</t> <fex name="Fix_loc">on their axes </fex>.</ex> <ex>The window <t>vibrated</t> <fex name="Fix_loc">in the frame</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Periodicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The number of times the <fen>Theme</fen> returns to a state in a given duration. <ex>They <t>spun</t> it <fex name="Per">at 1000 rpms</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Angle
FE.definition: <def-root>The amount of rotation that the <fen>Theme</fen> undergoes.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Theme</fen> is in bounded motion.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the bounded motion happens.</def-root>

FE.name: Direction
FE.definition: <def-root>The direction of rotation of the <fen>Theme</fen>. <ex>The dial <t>rotated</t> <fex name="Dir">clockwise</fex> one revolution, then the vault opened.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> describes the way in which the Theme moves in place.</def-root >

FE.name: Result
FE.definition: <def-root>The Result describes the end state brought about by the motion in place.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The Cause_external describes the force which sets into motion the motion. <ex>The strings <t>vibrated</t> <fex name="Explanation">with the impact of the wind</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition:
<def-root>A description of the <fen>Theme</fen> during the action.
</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of affairs that the agentive Theme hopes to bring about by moving.</def-root>

FE.name: Path_shape
FE.definition: <def-root>The shape formed by the path that the <fen>Theme</fen> follows.</def-root>
